newsitem.title: USA: Greenbriar files shelf, plans acquisitions.
newsitem.headline: Greenbriar files shelf, plans acquisitions.

text.p: Greenbriar Corp said Thursday it filed a shelf registration of four million shares of common stock.
"We intend to use these shares for future acquisitions," the company said in a statement.
The company said it does not have any specific acquisitions identified for the shares, but added that it has letters of intent in progress to acquire several additional communities.

Greenbriar owns, operates and manages 37 communities in eleven states. It provides assisted living retirement housing and services, including independent retirement and special care in residential environments for residents with Alzheimer's and other memory loss diseases.
